content:
Congratulations on your new job! It sounds like you've been keeping busy with all the traveling for meetings.

Now, let's focus on finding some great restaurants near the airport for your layover. Which airport are you flying out of and returning to? Please share the airport code (e.g., LAX, JFK, ORD, etc.), and I'd be happy to suggest some top-rated restaurants in the area.

Also, what type of cuisine are you in the mood for? Are you looking for something quick and casual or a more leisurely sit-down meal?
